about_the_game:
2022/5/19 release

AVABEL, the game enjoyed by over 50 million people worldwide, is now available for the large screen of your PC!
・Supports keyboard and controller
・The controls are now lighter for the PC, and buttons have been rearranged to make the screen easier to see and play!
・Accounts made on the the 2020 Bluestacks version for Steam cannot be used (Accounts that have previously been registed with Asobimo Phone Number Authentication will continue to be available).

◆Highly Strategic Action Battles
Enjoy the "Tower Scramble", where up to 1,000 players can fight at once, Guild & Team Battles, 1-on-1, and strategic PvP battles that will leave your palms sweating.
◆Classes Rich With Variety
From traditional classes such as 《Warrior》 and 《Magician》, pick from up to 135 classes, such as "Advanced Class", "Awaken Class", "Enlightened Awaken Class", and more!
Find the class that fits your own playstyle!
◆Enjoy Dressing Up
With over 3,000 original avatars to select from, mix and match to create your unique style.
◆Play Through Dungeons! Collect Items!
In addition to the Main Tower, challenge "dungeons" for rare items and further test your skills. Enjoy an adventure that meets your own goals and preferences.
Find your own special story for you and your friends in this flashy "Action MMORPG"!

Freely use your skills, including jumping and dashing, and aim to be 《the strongest》 in the world of AVABEL ONLINE!

【Game Summary】
Title: AVABEL ONLINE
Genre: Action MMORPG
*MMORPG: Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game

AVABEL, the game enjoyed by over 50 million people worldwide, is now available for the large screen of your PC!
・Supports keyboard and controller
・The controls are now lighter for the PC, and buttons have been rearranged to make the screen easier to see and play!
・Accounts made on the the 2020 Bluestacks version for Steam cannot be used (Accounts that have previously been registed with Asobimo Phone Number Authentication will continue to be available).

Enjoy the "Tower Scramble", where up to 1,000 players can fight at once, Guild & Team Battles, 1-on-1, and strategic PvP battles that will leave your palms sweating.

From traditional classes such as 《Warrior》 and 《Magician》, pick from up to 135 classes, such as "Advanced Class", "Awaken Class", "Enlightened Awaken Class", and more!

name: AVABEL ONLINE（Steam版）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support OpenGL 4.5+, DirectX 9+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The PC should have VT-s enabled for better performance experience
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10, 64bit, VT-s available
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support OpenGL 4.5+, DirectX 9+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The PC should have VT-s enabled for better performance experience

short_description: Enjoy the "Tower Scramble", where up to 1,000 players can fight at once, Guild & Team Battles, 1-on-1, and strategic PvP battles that will leave your palms sweating!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese
